shows.title: Frank Turner & The Sleeping Souls
shows.desc: With his diehard fanbase at his side, this hard-touring punk-folk troubadour has carved out a career as one of the UK’s most successful solo artists of the past decade. Greenbelt loves a maverick, and Frank does things on his own terms, with his heart on his sleeve and songs that bridge the personal and the political, the intimate and the universal. We’ve wanted to bring him to the festival for a very long time, and it’s fitting that he comes to us now with his new Clive James-inspired album Be More Kind – perfect for our vexed and divided times.
